parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.42

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns currently selected user chat channel on the UI (selected with < and > in MP).
{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable" style<template><title>=</title></template>"text-align: center"
! colspan<template><title>=</title></template>"16" <template><title>!</title></template> channel ID number correspondence

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> colspan<template><title>=</title></template>"10" <template><title>!</title></template> Custom Channels
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>- style<template><title>=</title></template>"font-size: .9em" 
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Global
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Side
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> Command

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 0
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 1
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template> 2

<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}
For Custom Radio, see [[radioChannelCreate]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''currentChannel'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - channelID
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_selected = [[currentChannel]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>3 - for example for the Group</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setCurrentChannel]], [[getPlayerChannel]], [[enableChannel]], [[channelEnabled]], [[radioChannelCreate]]
</value></part></template></root>
